title: Mel B close to vomiting as James Blunt downs pint of cottage cheese on Celebrity Juice
text:
To view this video please enable JavaScript, and consider upgrading to a web browser that supports HTML5 video

Mel B is left in despair as she watches James Blunt drink a dirty pint filled with pickled eggs and cottage cheese on Celebrity Juice.

The ITV2 show is set to return on Thursday 10 October, with Mel B replacing Paddy McGuinness as a new team captain after he was forced to pull out due to scheduling conflicts.

So what does Mel B endure on her first outing as team captain? She has to watch James Blunt neck a pint of beer filled with pickled egg juice, cottage cheese, cornflakes, and thai fish sauce.

Advertisement

Advertisement

Alright, Blunt clearly has the worst deal here – but Mel B isn’t exactly enjoying being a spectator.

James Blunt doesn’t seem to mind his dirty pint (Picture: ITV)

Alright there, Mel? (Picture: ITV)

As the crowd cheers on, even host Keith Lemon seems slightly concerned by the challenge – with guest Richard Arnold and team captain Holly Willoughby seen also turning away.

Surprisingly, Blunt downs the pint without a hitch – so we should probably give Back To Bedlam another spin in his honour.

Speaking about joining the show, Mel B said: ‘I am so happy that I’m going to be part of the Celebrity Juice family and thrilled to be a captain.

‘My mission is to give Keith a run for his money. Watch out. Things are going to get even more crazy.’

Celebrity Juice kicks off Thursday 10 October on ITV2 at 10pm.

MORE: Mel B says Celebrity Juice co-captain Holly Willoughby would drag her weave off to win

MORE: Mel B joins Celebrity Juice as team captain as Paddy McGuinness leaves over ‘scheduling conflicts’
description: Mel B is seen recoiling in horror as James Blunt downs a dirty pint on Celebrity Juice.
